column16: An insufficient amount of bus routes (many places aren't at all well connected and you have to change one or two buses to get there); a lot of the time taking a bus and walking will take you the same amount of time; there's pretty much no night transportation even though there's supposed to be; the buses are very infrequent; most buses are too small which frequently results in the bus being completely full and people having to wait another 15-20 minutes for the next one.
